text: Murder Drones is a computer-animated web program created by Liam Vickers and produced by Glitch Productions. The program follows the journey of Uzi, a worker teen robot. Set in a dystopian planet known as Copper 9 where humans have disappeared and Worker Drones who were left behind must keep themselves safe from Disassembly Drones. The pilot for the program was released on October 29, 2021 and made over almost twenty million views. The program was greenlit on February 18, 2022 and the program was released on November 18, 2022. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Comedy science fiction Category:Horror Category:Web series Category:Glitch Productions
title: Murder Drones
